Package io.permazen.encoding

Class NumberEncoding<T extends Number>

java.lang.Object
io.permazen.encoding.AbstractEncoding<T>
io.permazen.encoding.PrimitiveEncoding<T>
io.permazen.encoding.NumberEncoding<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Encoding<T>, NaturalSortAware, Serializable, Comparator<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleEncoding, FloatEncoding, IntegralEncoding
public abstract class NumberEncoding<T extends Number> extends PrimitiveEncoding<T>
Support superclass for the numeric primitive types.
